<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157962</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157962</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2081</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Earth Sciences + Environmental Education = Earth Systems Education</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geowissenschaften + Klimaausbildung = Masse 
Systeme Ausbildung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences de la terre + Éducation 
Environnementale = Éducation de Systèmes de la Terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências De Terra + Instrução Ambiental = 
Instrução Dos Sistemas Da Terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze della terra + Formazione Ambientale = 
Formazione Dei Sistemi Della Terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γήινες επιστήμες + περιβαλλοντική εκπαίδευση = 
εκπαίδευση γήινων συστημάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Geologías + Educación Ambiental = Educación De
los Sistemas De la Tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This article discusses the introduction of earth systems studies as part of the Environmental Education Curricula.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">envionmental sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Artikel behandelt die Einleitung der Masse
Systeme Studien als Teil der Klimaausbildung Lehrpläne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet article discute l'introduction des études de
systèmes de la terre en tant qu'élément des programmes d'études 
environnementaux d'éducation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este artigo discute a introdução de estudos dos
sistemas da terra como a parte dos curricula ambientais da 
instrução.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo articolo discute l'introduzione degli 
studi dei sistemi della terra come componente dei programmi di studi 
ambientali di formazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το άρθρο συζητά την εισαγωγή των μελετών των 
γήινων συστημάτων ως τμήμα των προγραμμάτων σπουδών 
περιβαλλοντικής εκπαίδευσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este artículo discute la introducción de los 
estudios de los sistemas de la tierra como parte de los planes de 
estudios ambientales de la educación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">envionmental Wissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les sciences envionmental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ciências envionmental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scienze envionmental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωλογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">envionmental επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">geología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ciencias envionmental</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
